name: AbDiff
abstract: Generative prediction of antibody conformational ensembles using diffusion models.

name: AbDock
abstract: Structure-aware antibody docking and complex refinement with uncertainty estimation.

name: AbDesign
abstract: Controllable antibody sequence design conditioned on epitope geometry and developability priors.

name: AbFit
abstract: Fast antibody structure prediction and loop flexibility scoring for engineering workflows.

name: ParatopeScope
abstract: Paratope identification and interface hotspot mapping for antibody–antigen recognition.

name: ImmuMap
abstract: Immune repertoire embedding and visualization for tracking clonal dynamics across conditions.

name: TCRDiff
abstract: Diffusion-based modeling of TCR conformational landscapes and peptide–MHC recognition.

name: ImmuGen
abstract: Generative design of immunogenic peptides with tunable HLA binding and safety constraints.

name: CytoSim
abstract: Cytokine signaling simulation and intervention ranking with mechanistic + learned models.

name: VaxRank
abstract: Vaccine candidate prioritization from antigen features, epitope coverage, and immune risk scores.
